Constructor Detail

BOXEmitter

public BOXEmitter(java.io.OutputStream os,
                  boolean useASCII,
                  boolean trimWhitespace)
           throws java.io.IOException
Encodes a Document to a given OutputStream. An explanation is not generated (see other encode method).
Parameters:
os - the OutputStream
useASCII - true to use ASCII; false to use UTF-8
trimWhitespace - true to trim whitespace in attribute and text values; false otherwise
Method Detail

emitAttribute

public void emitAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String value)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Emits an attribute that is not a namespace declaration. This must be called before calling emitElementStart for the element to which the attribute belongs!
Parameters:
name - the attribute name
value - the attribute value

emitComment

public void emitComment(java.lang.String text)
                 throws java.io.IOException

emitElementEnd

public void emitElementEnd()
                    throws java.io.IOException
Emits the end of the most recently emitted element start that hasn't yet been ended.

emitElementStart

public void emitElementStart(java.lang.String name)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Emits the start of an element. If the element has attributes, including namespace declarations, emit those before calling this.
Parameters:
name - the element name

emitNamespaceDeclaration

public void emitNamespaceDeclaration(java.lang.String prefix,
                                     java.lang.String uri)
                              throws java.io.IOException
Emits a namespace declaration. This must be called before calling emitElementStart for the element to which the namespace declaration belongs!
Parameters:
prefix - the namespace prefix
uri - the namespace URI

emitProcessingInstruction

public void emitProcessingInstruction(java.lang.String target,
                                      java.lang.String value)
                               throws java.io.IOException
Emits a processing instruction.
Parameters:
target - the processing instruction target
value - the processing instruction value

emitText

public void emitText(java.lang.String text)
              throws java.io.IOException
Emits text that belongs to the element with the most recently emitted element start.
Parameters:
text - the text
